notice.first: 1. Contract deployment means publishing a contract code to the Conflux network by sending a transaction. Before you deploy the contract, please ensure the BTC balance in your account is sufficient.

transfers.title: BTC Txns
transfers.description: Show only BTC txns on the Conflux network.

accounts.tipRight: accounts for BTC {{type}} are displayed, sorted by default in descending order of BTC {{type}}.

totalSupply.subtitle: The amount of BTC that are created in the market.

circulatingSupply.subtitle: The number of BTC that is available and circulating on the market.

transfer.title: BTC Transfer Statistics
transfer.subtitle: Daily transfer statistics for BTC on the Conflux network.

holderAccounts.title: BTC Holding Accounts
holderAccounts.subtitle: The total number of BTC accounts held on the Conflux network.

issued.description: The amount of BTC that are created in the market.

zeroAddress.description: BTC in Zero address is burned BTC.

holdingAccounts.title: BTC Holding Accounts
holdingAccounts.description: The total number of BTC accounts held on the Conflux network.

internalTxnsTip.tip: The 'Advanced' view also shows zero value BTC transfers, while the 'Simple' view only shows BTC transfers with value.

transaction.advancedViewTips: The Advanced View shows more information about BTC transfers.

toContract.detail: Insufficient balance. Total needs: {{total}} BTC = value ({{value}}) + gas ({{gas}}) * gasPrice ({{gasPrice}}). Balance: {{balance}} BTC.

addressConverter.notice: Attention, BTC cannot be transferred directly to the BSC address with any wallet, and cross-chain transfers are required via

block.reward: The miner of this block is rewarded with a finite amount of BTC, consists of base reward, reward from storage collateral interest and transaction fee.

tx.value: The value being transacted in BTC.
tx.gasLimitTip: Limit: Maximum amount of gas supplied for the transaction to happen. Normal BTC transfers involve 21,000 units while contracts involve higher value.

address.storageCollateral: The amount of storage collaterals paid by the current address, the unit is the BTC.
address.stakingEarned: Staking BTC Earned (APY 4%) does not contain withdrawn interest. Staked interest will be automatically sent to your wallet address each time it is withdrawn.
address.lockedEnd: to lock BTC for voting rights.

contract.storageCollateral: The amount of storage collaterals paid by the contract sponsor, the unit is the BTC.
